definition.content:
## Notes

Handshake uses two read replicas in US production:
- Web pods use `handshake-fluffy-sheep`
- All other pods use `handshake-arrogant-ape`

To review the queries on each database, use the following links:
- [handshake-arrogant-ape](https://console.cloud.google.com/sql/instances/handshake-arrogant-ape/insights)
- [handshake-fluffy-sheep](https://console.cloud.google.com/sql/instances/handshake-fluffy-sheep/insights)
